featured.text: With the completion of several public ______ projects, such as the MRT, commuting to work has become easier for people living in the suburbs.

definition.zh_def: 郊區，通常指城市周圍的住宅區，與市中心相對。
definition.en_def: A residential area on the outskirts of a city.
definition.example: They moved to a suburb to enjoy a quieter lifestyle.
